parameter.name: ip
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: The Hostname or IP address of the device

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The network port of the gateway

parameter.name: protocol
parameter.label: Protocol
parameter.description: The protocol to use for communicating with the gateway, valid values are: `DEFAULT` or `ELV`

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Polling interval for refreshing the data in seconds

parameter.name: discoverInterval
parameter.label: Discover Interval
parameter.description: Interval in seconds to fetch registered sensors, battery status and signal strength
